name: Rapid Revenge
description: This is a project I put together in about a week after I was assigned to build a game in Unity based on the Space Shooter tutorial. I went with an aquatic theme as I always thought futuristic boats looked nice. Features I added in contrast to the original Space Shooter include power ups, shields, unbreakable obstacles, extra lives when earning enough points and a health bar. This game was designed for Windows platforms.
